languages.text: {n}Раздраженно зашипев, Тервантьяс отмахивается, чуть не располосовав вам лицо пальцами-лезвиями. Его голос лязгает гильотиной:{/n} "Нет, образец".
{n}With an irritated hiss, Tervantias waves a hand and nearly slashes your face with his bladed fingers. His voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine:{/n} "No, specimen."
languages.original_text: {n}Раздраженно зашипев, Тервантьяс отмахивается, чуть не располосовав вам лицо пальцами-лезвиями. Его голос лязгает гильотиной:{/n} "Нет, образец".

traits.locale_text: {n}With an irritated hiss, Tervantias waves a hand and nearly slashes your face with his bladed fingers. His voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine:{/n} "No, specimen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus's voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine.{/n} "No!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}With an irritated hiss, Tervantias waves a hand and nearly slashes your face with his bladed fingers. His voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine:{/n} "No, specimen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}With an irritated hiss, Tervantias waves a hand and nearly slashes your face with his bladed fingers. His voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine:{/n} "No, specimen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}With an irritated hiss, Tervantias waves a hand and nearly slashes your face with his bladed fingers. His voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine:{/n} "No, specimen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Dans un sifflement irrité, Tervantias agite la main, manquant de peu de vous défigurer de ses doigts acérés. Sa réponse est tranchante comme un couperet.{/n} « Non, spécimen. »
languages.original_text: {n}With an irritated hiss, Tervantias waves a hand and nearly slashes your face with his bladed fingers. His voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine:{/n} "No, specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans un sifflement irrité, Tervantias agite la main, manquant de peu de vous défigurer de ses doigts acérés. Sa réponse est tranchante comme un couperet.{/n} « Non, spécimen. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}特凡提亚斯恼怒地嘶吼一声，挥起了其中一只手，刀刃般锋利的手指差点划破了你的脸。他的声音仿佛断头台一般，毫无转圜余地。{/n}“不行，实验对象。”
languages.original_text: {n}With an irritated hiss, Tervantias waves a hand and nearly slashes your face with his bladed fingers. His voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine:{/n} "No, specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人的声音就像断头台一样铿锵有力。{/n}“不行！”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Mit einem gereizten Zischen winkt Tervantias mit der Hand und zerschneidet dir dabei mit seinen Klingenfingern fast das Gesicht. Seine Stimme ist schärfer als eine Guillotine:{/n} "Nein, Versuchsstück."
languages.original_text: {n}With an irritated hiss, Tervantias waves a hand and nearly slashes your face with his bladed fingers. His voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine:{/n} "No, specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Haemonculus klingt wie eine Guillotine.{/n} "Nein!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Emitiendo un bufido de irritación, Tervantias agita una mano hasta casi rajarte la cara con sus dedos afilados. Su voz es acerada como una guillotina:{/n} «No, espécimen».
languages.original_text: {n}With an irritated hiss, Tervantias waves a hand and nearly slashes your face with his bladed fingers. His voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine:{/n} "No, specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del Hemónculo suena tan afilada como una guillotina.{/n} «¡No!».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}苛立った声を上げながら、テルヴァンティアスは手を振り、刃のついた指であなたの顔を切りつけようとする。その声音は、ギロチンの如き鋭い響きを伴う。{/n}「違うぞ、標本よ」
languages.original_text: {n}With an irritated hiss, Tervantias waves a hand and nearly slashes your face with his bladed fingers. His voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine:{/n} "No, specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}苛立った声を上げながら、テルヴァンティアスは手を振り、刃のついた指であなたの顔を切りつけようとする。その声音は、ギロチンの如き鋭い響きを伴う。{/n}「違うぞ、標本よ」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}İrite olmuş bir şekilde tıslayan Tervantias, elinin birini savurup bıçaklı parmaklarıyla yüzünü keser gibi yapıyor. Sesi bir giyotin gibi tınlıyor.{/n} "Hayır numune."
languages.original_text: {n}With an irritated hiss, Tervantias waves a hand and nearly slashes your face with his bladed fingers. His voice clangs as sharply as a guillotine:{/n} "No, specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}İrite olmuş bir şekilde tıslayan Tervantias, elinin birini savuruyor ve bıçaklı parmaklarıyla yüzünü keser gibi yapıyor. Sesi bir giyotin gibi tınlıyor.{/n} "Hayır numune."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
